translation.Message_0_Page_0: If there is two things that will greatly help you succeed it is: vehicles and setting up a base.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Vehicles have large trunk space that will help you manage the load. Setting up a base will allow you to sort out your items, create a respawn point and you can also keep your vehicle safe!
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Wood will likely be the easiest choice to build your base out of but consider upgrading to brick or metals if you are planning to settle down.
